Question: This person portrays Colonel Woodrow Dolarhyde, a character who rules the town of Absolution with an iron fist.
Hints: This person first encountered the Beaver while filming Six Days Seven Nights, and soon purchased one.
In 1960, this person graduated from Maine East High School in Park Ridge, Illinois.
This person was active in the Boy Scouts of America, and achieved its second-highest rank, Life Scout.
